title: Extremely high ping 300-2000
body: Since playing Lol, I'm used to a 20-30 ping but for the past few weeks it's been going at aruond 200-300 and sometimes spiking to the thousands. It is extremely difficult to play as everything freezes in team fights and when it unfreezes I'm already dead. Abilities and spells are also very delayed by atleast 5 seconds. I also glitch around the map alot because of this. I've lost most games because of this and I don't know how to fix this problem. Anyone know how?

replies.body:
Hey there, 

Sorry for the delayed response.

Could you please download [WinMTR](http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/winmtr/WinMTR-v092.zip) and run a traceroute to the following IP address (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes), export the results as text and reply back with them (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this.)

>103.240.227.5

Could I also get you to run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results page.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=58uA8nXc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-23T06:20:53.539+0000)
>
> Hey there, 
> 
> Sorry for the delayed response.
> 
> Could you please download [WinMTR](http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/winmtr/WinMTR-v092.zip) and run a traceroute to the following IP address (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes), export the results as text and reply back with them (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this.)
> 
> Could I also get you to run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results page.

 Here is my results from WinMTR which I have uploaded to Pastebin http://pastebin.com/ZpavgMdW
 And here is my ICSI netalyzer results http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=43ca253f-30007-b101294e-5c9c-441f-a319. Please answer soon. I would appreciate your help.

Hey there,

There is definitely some noticeable packet loss occurring there which appears to originate from your ISP's end, you'll have to contact them in regards to this as we're unable to help.

You're also experiencing a high packet buffering rate on your network which could be the result of certain third party applications running.
For more information on packet buffering and a list of applications which have been known to increase the buffering rate please see [this knowledgebase article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7).
